report_title: KJET Embu County Application Ranking and Evaluation

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Active off-take contracts/POs, multi-channel sales (50% B2B), defensible pricing.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem–solution (cold chain, processing), quantified SMART targets, detailed plan.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (processing/cooling), strong linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: High participation (50%+ women/youth), 2+ green practices (solar, biogas, tree seedlings).

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover >KES 10M, strong trend (27M→48M), simple income proof provided.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent monthly orders (milk processors), multiple channels, basic quality assurance.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan with minor gaps; targets & timelines present.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Dairy), critical node (cooling/aggregation), documented linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong gender/youth participation, 1-2 green practices (tree nursery, better farming methods).

applications.applicant_name: KIRDI-KIEP Business Incubation and Innovation Support Program

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Registered <1 yr, basic structure in place.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Turnover <1M, sporadic records/thin evidence, negative trend.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Direction clear; targets generic; budget rough.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Edible Oils), fills a critical node (cold-pressing), documented linkages.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong gender/youth participation, 1-2 green practices (bee keeping, organic farming).

applications.reason: The primary value chain is Cassava, which is not listed in the KJET Priority (Edible Oils, Dairy, Textiles, Construction) or Additional (Rice, Tea, Blue Economy, Minerals, Forestry, Leather) value chains.

applications.applicant_name: Embu County United Bee Farmers Association
applications.reason: The primary value chain is Apiculture (Honey/Beekeeping). While there is a mention of a linkage to Edible Oils (sunflower), the core business is not one of the KJET Priority or Additional value chains.

The financial statement provided is a simple bank statement with a low closing balance (KES 6,400.84) and minimal transaction activity, failing to meet the minimum threshold for verifiable financial health/evidence for a B2B business.
Provided M-Pesa statements show a low-volume flow of funds (KES 10,000 range) and do not support the stated KES 3.5M annual turnover, thus failing to provide verifiable financial evidence.
The application claims KES 0 turnover/profit for all 3 years (2022-2024) and lacks any bank/M-Pesa statements or other financial documents, thus failing E4.
